name: Bubble Shooter: Legend Puzzle
description:
Very exciting puzzle game, you need to destroy multi-colored balls, which constantly roll into the hole. Your task is not to let the balls reach the hole.

In this game you need to control the ballista, shoot multi-colored balls. Shoot the balls of the same color as yours, explode 3 or more balls of the same color and the chain will explode! You always have one extra ball, just tap on the ballista to swap the balls.

Sometimes different power-ups appear: slowdown, knockback, bomb, lightning, laser and rainbow ball. They really help you to beat levels, try to collect power-ups in the first place. But if balls reach gameover, you have to start the level again.

Very interesting and colorful game. Everyone can play it because the controls are very easy to pick up. In total, there are 4 game worlds with 40 different levels, gradually we will add new worlds. Each game world is unique, each one has its own atmosphere, props and even music! Excellent animation, explosion effects and a sea of positive emotions are waiting for you! For all fans old style game.
